Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in Akka.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.4.46, all versions after 1.5.0-alpha1 before 1.5.0-alpha3
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.4.46 up to 1.5.0-alpha1, all versions starting from 1.5.0-alpha3
Solution: Upgrade to versions 1.4.46, 1.5.0-alpha3 or above. *Note*: 1.5.0-alpha3 may be an unstable version. Use caution.
